name: Geprek & Susu
description:
2 players who become a spicy food lovers will compete for the title of Jawara Pedas at Geprek & Susu restaurant. Simple.. but still feel the taste of spicy. Don't forget to drink your milk.

Sincerely

Geprek & Susu

ControlsP1P2Eatq[Drinkw]
